front.title: The ACPKM internal re-keying mechanism for block cipher modes of operation

abstract.t: This specification presents an approach to increase the security of block cipher operation modes based on re-keying (with no additional keys needed) during each separate message processing. It provides an internal re-keying mechanism called ACPKM. This mechanism doesn't require additional secret parameters or complicated transforms - for key update only the base encryption function is used.
